import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import io from"socket.io-client";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const socket=io(`${import.meta.env.VITE_REACT_APP_BACKEND_BASEURL}`);// Change to your backend URL if needed
const Chat=()=>{const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const[message,setMessage]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{socket.on("receiveMessage",newMessage=>{setMessages(prevMessages=>[...prevMessages,newMessage]);});return()=>{socket.off("receiveMessage");};},[]);const sendMessage=()=>{if(message.trim()){const messageData={text:message,sender:"User"};socket.emit("sendMessage",messageData);setMessages(prevMessages=>[...prevMessages,messageData]);setMessage("");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"\uD83D\uDCAC Live Chat"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{border:"1px solid #ccc",height:"200px",overflowY:"auto"},children:messages.map((msg,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("strong",{children:[msg.sender,":"]})," ",msg.text]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:message,onChange:e=>setMessage(e.target.value),placeholder:"Type your message..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:sendMessage,children:"Send"})]});};export default Chat;
